The original paper map was scanned, georeferenced, and rectified to broaden access and to facilitate use in GIS software.</abstract><purpose>This georectified digital map was created for the purpose of facilitating discovery and use in GIS systems.  The positional accuracy of this map is limited.  The map is intended for viewing and not for measurements or calculations.
